Habitat: Sand dune habitats with grasses (Panicum; Poa). Very friable soils
Source: Malizia et al. (1991) Comparatore et al. (1992)

Habitat: Sand dune habitats at about 800 m. Friable soils

Distribution: From SW Bolivia into Jujuy and Salta Province, Argentina
Habitat: Grassy meadows between 2000 and 4500 m. Deep, humousand presumably compact soils
Dry areas with xeric vegetation at about 600 m. Soft and sandy soils

Distribution: A broad range from Santa Cruz north to Mendoza Province

Distribution: From southern Perú to northern Chile and Argentina

Source: Pearson (1959) Redford & Eisenberg (1992) Cook et al. (1990)

Distribution: Soriano, San José, and Colonia departments, Uruguay
Habitat: Predominantly sandy soils with variable clay-loam fraction

Distribution: Along the coast of Buenos Aires Province, Argentina
